lyrics:
8 contributorsit goes like this lyricsverse 1
hey girl you make me wanna write a song
sit you down ill sing it to you all night long
ive had a melody in my head

yeah girl you make me wanna write a song

chorus

to write my name on your heart get you wrapped in my arms
baby all around you
and it goes like hey girl im blown away
but yeah it starts with a smile and it ends with an allnightlong slow kiss
yeah it goes like this

verse 2
hey girl you make me wanna drive you home
get you outta here and get you all alone

but im all messed up and it might sound crazy
but you make me wanna write a song
